> <OLD>
>
> "No let me explain myself"replied perceptor he tought a second and said "My
> suggestion is swich thier signatures, specialy Nightlight's; if Hydras is
> seeking recapture her again, he will have to find her firts; let me tell me
> how: every cr in Blackfortress or our old base have a record of every bot
> signature that have been inside even in some cases took samples of them...
> do you remember what happened with Dinobot and his double in Beast wars? or
> with Optimus Prime's puppet that MEgatron attemped to use against Autobots?
> something like that could happen again and had happened in Neo beast
> wars... Other way to defend themselves would be inserting a stealth program
> that will mask their signatures from every one, just like the device that I
> gave Nightlight to hide for Maximals... and unluky... for Hydras, it had the
> side effect to hide her for Predacons too. This one will work in that way
> but this one would be part of their bodies... not a device and could be used
> at will"
>
> "it would be like we were playing hide and seek "said Elita with a childish
> tone
>
> "a deadly serious one"replied dryly Perceptor"With those two options they
> would be more safer in my point of view"

<NEW>

Rodimus nodded thoughtfully as Perceptor sppoke, his face going from
what was mild alarm slowly into a more relaxed posture. He stood up
and walked towards he daughter, scooping her up into his arms, "You
have been through a lot today young one." he said, his voice serious
as he looked at her, "This is not a choice that can be made lightly.
Once we put that on you *we* might have trouble finding you too should
you get lost."

Rodimus began to pace, holding Elita in his arms as he did so, his
thoughts churning. He looked over at the comotose form of his wife,
his optics still worried. So many choices to make, so many dangers.

He sighed and turned to Perceptor, "Do it." he said.

(TAG)

Preston
